name: Last Eclipse
description:
Guardians and Gods fight for earth's balance






The earth for thousands of years has been controlled by four
gods in charge of the seasons and four guardians who guard
the delicate balance of the earth.
Humans with their pollution are about to end the balance of
the earth, global warming is the trigger for the great
sacred war to begin.




Currently, the game includes:

- 8 playable characters
- 8 stages
- Story mode for all 8 characters
- Dialogues between fights
- killer insting style combo system
- 8 original music themes
- Vs. AI mode
- Training mode
- Arcade Stick arcade support
- A controller is required for local multiplayer.
